articles.author: Gautham Krishna
articles.title: "Need more people like Daniil Medvedev"; "How can you not love this man?" - Fans react to Russian's 'masterclass' after making Australian Open QF - Sportskeeda
articles.description: Tennis fans have wholeheartedly embraced Daniil Medvedev's entertaining 'masterclass' about returning a serve at the 2024 Australian Open.
articles.content:
Tennis fans have wholeheartedly embraced Daniil Medvedev's entertaining 'masterclass' about returning a serve at the 2024 Australian Open.
